biotools.summary:
A powerful platform for deciphering proteome profiling of multi-tumor mass spectrometry data by using deep neural networks.

A powerful software for deciphering proteome profiling of multi-tumour mass spectrometry data using deep neural networks.

MSpectraAI is a free, user-friendly and comprehensive software for mining and classifying raw LC-MS2-based proteomics or metabolomics data of different samples using deep learning models. Users can also built your own deep neural network model in this software. It is developed with R and an example is shown here: https://www.omicsolution.org/wukong/MSpectraAI/.
